title: Update on the spooky siren from a couple nights ago...
body:
For reference, this is what happened two nights back: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/NIIvGx10-theres-a-really-spooky-siren-sound-coming-from-somewhere

tl;dr: So there was this weird siren that sounded spooky, and almost musical, but the notes were being played out of order. I drove out and tracked it down to a siren randomly by a tiny baseball field. It stopped not long after I got there after going on for at least an hour. So I was left with more questions than answers and got McDonald's.

And now to today: I asked some friends that live nearby, a couple neighbors, and some people working at the gas station not far away form where the siren was upon getting some gas earlier. There was a police officer getting a drink at the soda fountain and I even asked him.

*Absolutely no one knows what the siren was for or why it went on for so long.*

My friends have no idea. My neighbors have no idea. People that work nearby have no idea. Not even a fucking police officer could confirm what it was, but he said he heard it too while he was home and off-duty (he actually lives a couple streets over from my house).

#I fucking love October.
